title: Two wheeled motor cycle - Two wheeled motor cycle parking space one for every two residential tenements may be provided
clause_text: Two wheeled motor cycle - Two wheeled motor cycle parking space one for every two residential tenements may be provided. For other occupancies, two wheeled motor cycle parking space equal to the required number of four wheeled parking spaces may be provided. If such parking for two wheeled motor cycle is proposed, the same may be distinctly shown in the plan.
